#Introduction
This repo contains the following files
* run_analysis.R - includes the R code for the project
* CodeBook.md - includes information about the data, transformation performed, R code, and variables included in the final dataset
* final_data.txt - this is the final tidy dataset for the project

#How to run the R program
* Unzip the raw data to the following directory C:/Projects/coursera/GettingandCleaningData/project/UCI HAR Dataset
* Open R studio. I used R studio version 0.98.1062
* Run the script run_analysis.R
